duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor overall production status for all 3 Manufacturing lines at TMMK.
Support the Production Control department’s objective to oversee ALC operations to ensure production results are achieved for all 3 Manufacturing lines.
Lead/coordinate meetings with all TMMK areas to ensure abnormal vehicle flow conditions are understood and issues are resolved timely.
Operate GALC and GALIS systems to develop and maintain production instructions for vehicle build.
Manage build-out and start of new model vehicles with Manufacturing.
Coordinate trial builds with all shops and manage takt time changes and shutdown coordination.
Maintain and operate GALC system to track each vehicle's progress from order receipt to exit to Toyota Logistics Services.
Manage delayed vehicles by coordinating movement between processes to meet customer's expectations of shipping vehicles within 8 hours.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or Higher or 5+ years of equivalent professional experience in Production Control for manufacturing
